layout.name: Amazon Tomcat
layout.description: This will provision a single process with no redundancy

optionTypes.name: config.noAgent
optionTypes.helpBlock: Skipping Agent installation will result in a lack of logging and guest operating system statistics. Automation scripts may also be adversely affected.
optionTypes.label: Skip Agent Install

customOptionTypes.name: layout description
customOptionTypes.defaultValue: This will provision a single vm

customOptionTypes.name: mount data
customOptionTypes.helpBlock: (Optional) If using deployment services, this mount point will be replaced with the contents of said deployments.

layout.name: Amazon Master
layout.description: This will provision a single master vm in amazon

optionTypes.name: config.noAgent
optionTypes.helpBlock: Skipping Agent installation will result in a lack of logging and guest operating system statistics. Automation scripts may also be adversely affected.
optionTypes.label: Skip Agent Install

customOptionTypes.name: mount data
customOptionTypes.helpBlock: (Optional) If using deployment services, this mount point will be replaced with the contents of said deployments.

customOptionTypes.name: layout description
customOptionTypes.defaultValue: This will provision a single vm

optionTypes.name: config.rootPassword
optionTypes.description: An initial root password to be set on the mysql instance when provisioned.
optionTypes.label: Root Password

optionTypes.name: config.username
optionTypes.description: Username of user to be automatically created in mysql.
optionTypes.label: Username

optionTypes.name: config.password
optionTypes.description: Password to be set for newly created user.
optionTypes.label: Password
